content: *light lacy stitches and an attention-grabbing starburst motif at the neckline shape this standout sweater lionbrand com * lion brand pattern # 60203ad skill level experienced size small medium large 1x 2x finished bust 33 36 41 46 52 in 84 91 5 104 118 132 cm #820 lion wool *some colors in original pattern have been discontinued * a cocoa 4-7 balls b lemongrass 2-3 balls c dark teal 2-3 balls 3 colors 8-13 balls total crochet hook - size i-9 split ring stitch markers gauge 7 repeats in open pattern 2 double_crochet chain 2 = 6 in 15 cm 8 row = 4 in 10 cm patterns rib pattern multiple of 2 sts open pattern multiple of 4 sts + 2 extra pieces front back sleeves 2 neckline motif construction schematics are provided
